entry.title: How to Create Arrows in Inkscape

media:group.media:title: How to Create Arrows in Inkscape
media:group.media:description:
In this Inkscape basics tutorial, I take an in-depth look at how to draw arrows using the pen tool and "markers" feature inside the Fill and Stroke dialogue. Arrows are a great way to add eye-catching graphics to your projects, while also serving a more functional role of drawing viewers' attention to a particular item or making a connection between objects. I cover all the customization settings for drawing arrows (including all the types of arrowheads or markers) in this tutorial.
Check out the Help Article version of this tutorial, available in 30+ languages: https://daviesmediadesign.com/how-to-create-arrows-in-inkscape/
Visit our website for more text and video tutorials: https://www.daviesmediadesign.com/inkscape-tutorials/

entry.title: How to Create a Transparent Gradient in GIMP

media:group.media:title: How to Create a Transparent Gradient in GIMP
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP Basics tutorial, I show you how to add a transparent gradient to your image or composition! This is a very easy technique that requires some of GIMP's built-in tools and features, including the gradient tool and layer mask.
Once you've created the transparent gradient effect, you can then export the image with the transparent gradient - which I also show you how to do in this tutorial. So, this is a sort-of bonus two-for-one video! You will learn how to export the photo to a PNG, which supports transparent backgrounds.
GIMP is a free photo editor most similar to Photoshop or Affinity Photo.
Visit our website for more text and video tutorials: https://www.daviesmediadesign.com/tutorials/

entry.title: How to Crop a Single Layer in GIMP

media:group.media:title: How to Crop a Single Layer in GIMP
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP basics tutorial, I show you a beginner-friendly way to crop a single layer in your composition. This technique works when you have multiple layers, for example two images open in a single composition, and you only want to crop one of those images or layers. I show you how to accomplish this using GIMP's crop tool.

entry.title: GIMP's Live Vignette Filter Is Incredible | In-Depth Look

media:group.media:title: GIMP's Live Vignette Filter Is Incredible | In-Depth Look
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP tutorial, I cover the on-canvas vignette filter, or "Live Vignette," that comes with this amazing free photo editor. This features was introduced in GIMP 2.10.20 and allows you to quickly add a vignette to your images while customizing the filter and its settings live on your canvas. You can see your changes in real time while using the easy-to-use on-canvas controls to make any adjustments to the filter before applying the effect to your image. Plus, I show you a trick for a more non-destructive way of adding the vignette to your image.
Visit our website for more text and video tutorials: https://www.daviesmediadesign.com/tutorials/

entry.title: How to Reshow the Inkscape Welcome Window

media:group.media:title: How to Reshow the Inkscape Welcome Window
media:group.media:description:
In this Inkscape tutorial I show you how to reshow the welcome window when opening Inkscape for a new session. This welcome window contains convenient features like choosing from a list of premade document templates, canvas and theme customizations, a dark mode toggle, and opening previous compositions. If you've accidently turned off showing the welcome window on restart, this tutorial will show you how to re-enable the feature so it opens every time you start a new Inkscape session.

entry.title: How to Change Your Document Size in Inkscape 1.2

media:group.media:title: How to Change Your Document Size in Inkscape 1.2
media:group.media:description:
In this Inkscape basics tutorial, I show you how to resize your document to any dimensions. You can use the default template sizes, or manually set your own document dimensions with these very simple steps. If you're a total beginner and stuck on how to change the size of your document, this beginner friendly tutorial will help you out!

entry.title: How to Create a Circle in GIMP | GIMP Basics

media:group.media:title: How to Create a Circle in GIMP | GIMP Basics
media:group.media:description:
In this tutorial, I show you how to draw circles in GIMP using built-in shape tools. I show you how to use the Ellipse Select tool to draw a perfect circle, plus how to add a color fill or change the color of your circle. This is a super easy, beginner-friendly tutorial that is perfect for any level of GIMP user.

entry.title: New CMYK Features in GIMP 2.99.12 Explained

media:group.media:title: New CMYK Features in GIMP 2.99.12 Explained
media:group.media:description:
In this tutorial, I discuss all the new CMYK features that rolled out with GIMP 2.99.12 - the latest development release version of GIMP. I demonstrate the new soft proofing features, including the soft proofing icon at the bottom of the image canvas, plus show how GIMP can now open CMYK files and export to CMYK. While these new features are not full CMYK support, including editing in CMYK color space, they are a major milestone for GIMP offering CMYK compatible features and getting to full CMYK support.
0:00 - Intro & Resources 0:38 - Adding a CMYK Color Profile 2:56 - New Soft Proofing Toggle 5:19 - Add CMYK Soft Proofing Profiles to New Images 5:55 - Export Images with CMYK Color Profile 7:16 - Late Binding CMYK vs Early Binding CMYK 7:59 - Import Images with CMYK Color Profiles 8:55 - Color Tools Accurately Display CMYK Colors 9:55 - Final Thoughts
Where to Download CMYK Color Profiles for GIMP: https://daviesmediadesign.com/where-to-download-cmyk-color-profiles-for-gimp/

entry.title: How to Add a Gradient Fill to Text in Inkscape

media:group.media:title: How to Add a Gradient Fill to Text in Inkscape
media:group.media:description:
In this Inkscape basics tutorial, I show you how to add a gradient fill to your text to create amazing typography and text effects. I also show you how to add a gradient to the STROKE of your text (yes, you can have gradients in the fill and the stroke of your text in Inkscape). I cover the text tool, gradient tool, plus the fill and stroke dialogue and the new gradient editor in Inkscape 1.2.
Inkscape is a free and open source vector graphics editor most similar to Adobe Illustrator or Affinity Designer.

entry.title: How to Create See-Through Cutout Text in GIMP

media:group.media:title: How to Create See-Through Cutout Text in GIMP
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP basics tutorial I show you how to create text cut out of a rectangle and how to make the text effect transparent. This is a really easy technique that involves some basic tools like the text tool and rectangle select tool. The transparent cutout text is overlaid on an image, helping to enhance the effect of the text. Love typography and graphic design? This is the perfect video for you!
GIMP is most similar to Photoshop but is a free and open source photo editor with lots of cool graphic design features.

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: How to Create Vertical Text in GIMP | Text Tool Basics

media:group.media:title: How to Create Vertical Text in GIMP | Text Tool Basics
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP text tool tutorial, I show you how to add vertical text to your image or composition using GIMP! This is super easy to do and can help you create great text effects, or simply help those of you who write in languages with vertical text.
This tutorial was made for beginners, but can also be helpful for those of you experienced with GIMP or the text tool.

entry.title: Create Better Neon Text With GIMP

media:group.media:title: Create Better Neon Text With GIMP
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP tutorial, I show you how to create a better neon text effect using all built-in tools! Make your text look like neon tubes, plus add realistic lighting effects and have your neon text interact with a brick wall. This technique requires several steps, but is surprisingly easy and beginner-friendly! Learn how to work with paths, text, blur filters, and layer modes in this awesome tutorial.
GIMP is a free photo editor, most similar to Photoshop, that can also be used for graphic design projects like this one. It is "free and open source," and developed by a community of volunteer developers.

entry.title: 10 Things That Annoy GIMP Beginners (And How to Fix Them)

media:group.media:title: 10 Things That Annoy GIMP Beginners (And How to Fix Them)
media:group.media:description:
In this video featuring GIMP, the free photo editor and popular Photoshop alternative, I cover 10 things that drive beginners crazy when using the program. But don't fret! I also show you all the easy ways to fix these issues or idiosyncrasies with GIMP so you can keep editing and keep creating, stress free. This is a great introduction for beginners feeling frustrated with GIMP as it shows some common problems new users run into when using the software.
0:00 - Intro & Resources 0:46 - Move Tool Doesn't Move Active Layer 2:26 - Can't Save to JPEG 4:40 - Image Keeps Losing Quality After Transformation 9:56 - Path Tool Handles Operate Independently 11:43 - Can't Select Multiple Layers 14:56 - There's No Hand Tool in GIMP? 15:48 - Eraser Tool Not Erasing to Transparency 17:02 - Can't Move Objects On My Image 18:49 - GIMP Dialogues Are Missing 23:34 - Nothing Happens When Painting On Layer Mask

entry.title: Surprisingly Easy Layered Typography Effect in GIMP

media:group.media:title: Surprisingly Easy Layered Typography Effect in GIMP
media:group.media:description:
In this tutorial, I show you how to create a cool text effect that makes it appear as if your text is tucked underneath wavy lines throughout your image. This gives your text a neat 3D appearance and makes your lettering more eye-catching. The best part? This technique is really easy to do and requires only built-in filters and features in GIMP, the free photo editor!
